definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Let's eat now and maybe we could catch a movie later.
sentences.chinese: 咱们现在就吃，说不定吃完能赶场电影。

sentences.english: Keep your words soft and tender because tomorrow you may have to eat them.
sentences.chinese: 保持言语温和，说不定明天你就自食其言。

sentences.english: A tenacious auditor might want to make an example out of you.
sentences.chinese: 某个固执的审计员说不定想拿你来杀鸡儆猴。

sentences.english: However, if he will not walk, it might be enough to put on usual sneakers.
sentences.chinese: 但，如果说不定不走，用普通的旅游鞋也没问题。

sentences.english: Maybe there had even been others during Louise’s pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在露易莎怀孕期间说不定还有别人。

sentences.english: Maybe one day I'll have to beg a meal off you in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 说不定以后我混不下去了到北京还得找你给我口饭吃。

sentences.english: Suddenly, someone said: "Maybe Wang will run away."
sentences.chinese: 说不定王常盈那小子想开溜。

sentences.english: By some good fortune, the universe grants me at least one of those a day.
sentences.chinese: 说不定幸运些，宇宙就会赐予我至少一天那样的时间。

sentences.english: Every now and then, one of us goes to the kitchen to make coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩人说不定是谁，时不时去厨房沏杯咖啡。

sentences.english: It might be worth giving her a ring and asking if she has any ideas.
sentences.chinese: 给她打个电话问问看，说不定能解决问题。

sentences.english: One of these days, I might get around to marketing it.
sentences.chinese: 说不定我哪天把这个也推向市场呢。

sentences.english: Maybe I will watch that TV show sometime.
sentences.chinese: 说不定我还真会抽空看看那部电视剧。

sentences.english: If other vagrancy were to be recorded, maybe it would be very interesting.
sentences.chinese: 如果别的漫游他也拍下来的话，说不定也会挺有意思。

sentences.english: You may be able to avoid or delay surgery.
sentences.chinese: 说不定你就能避免或推迟手术。
说不定哪一天我们会发财的。

sentences.english: If the day collapses down, perhaps how many stars can pick?
sentences.chinese: 如果天塌下来，说不定可以捡到几颗星星？

definition: when the moment comes/at that time
just in case/if by any chance/contingency
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
